verses.name: Mark 6:28
verses.text: And brought his head in a charger, and gave it to the damsel: and the damsel gave it to her mother.

verses.name: Mark 6:29
verses.text: And when his disciples heard of it, they came and took up his corpse, and laid it in a tomb.

verses.name: Mark 6:30
verses.text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus, and told him all things, both what they had done, and what they had taught.

verses.name: Mark 6:31
verses.text: And he said unto them, Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place, and rest a while: for there were many coming and going, and they had no leisure so much as to eat.
